title: St Albans: an ethnic programme
creator_credit: Ian Hart and Canberra. College of Advanced Education. Media Centre
brief_description: St Albans is a multilingual, multicultural community where 85% of the population are migrants from non-English speaking countries. St Albans East Primary School, with a school’s commission grant, employ parents in a program to increase the children’s awareness of community languages and culture.
